name: get_all_kfc_locations
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kfc_locations.
Tool description: Our KFC Locations API is a comprehensive and accurate data source of all KFC restaurant locations in the United States. This API allows users to retrieve detailed information about each location, including address, phone number, hours of operation, and more. This data can be easily integrated into a wide range of use cases, such as delivery services, marketing, retail analysis, navigation, and research and development.
API description: Fetches a list of KFC locations from the KFC Locations API for a given page number.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve, with each page typically containing 10 results.
